description: Discover the best hotels in New Farm, Australia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Five-Star Brisbane CBD Spicers Boutique Luxury with Sunset Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Indulge in five-star urban glamour at Spicers Balfour Hotel, a jewel in Queensland's much-loved New Farm area. While the surrounding streets are abuzz with restaurants, a cinema, pubs and boutiques, find a restful retreat at the hotel's rooftop bar, a prime spot to enjoy the sunset. At Balfour Kitchen & Bar, feast on award-winning Vietnamese fare created with fresh local produce and sustainably sourced seafood and meats, or treat yourself to a famous Balfour High Tea, perfect for any occasion.

seo.title: Hotels in New Farm - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Find the best hotels in New Farm, Australia with exclusive deals. Book your perfect getaway with up to 60% off.
